I am fighting for that kind of comprehensive reform. As an advocate, I pushed for H-4EAD to be implemented. In Congress, I'm urging DHS to maintain this rule.

I've been through an alphabet soup of visas, H-1B included, and I know this system well. It is broken and canceling spousal work permits won't fix it. We need to address the huge immigration backlog, continue allowing spouses to support themselves and pass comprehensive reform.

H-4EAD is helping hundreds of thousands of spouses ‚Äì largely women ‚Äì by allowing them to further support themselves and their families. Their job security has factored into huge family decisions like where to live and if/when they'll have kids.

This move by Trump's administration is upending lives. We need to focus on real, comprehensive reform ‚Äì not stealing the livelihoods and money-making power of immigrant spouses.
